Created an attachment (id=32383)
Test project

Note, that I have exception almost always, but sometimes I can avoid it if try to move some images from folder "image" and return it back. So, it seems that error depends on order of images in list.

Fixed > 20060103

The problem was that ImageList.copyWithAlpha() returned a bitmap that was too big causing ImageList_Add() to infer that more than one bitmap should be added to the image list.  Later on, when the image list count is queried from the operating system, it doesn't match the size of the array of images kept in Java memory.  Wow.
*** Bug 124739 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
